ships.name: I.R.W. Belak
ships.text: When defending, you may re-roll 1 of your [battlestations] results. If your ship is cloaked, you may re-roll all of your [battlestations] results.

captains.name: Lovok
captains.text:
During the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Lovok may field the Tal Shiar [talent] Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Tal Shiar
upgrades.text:
During the Planning Phase, after all ships have chosen their maneuvers, you may discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-3 and look at that ship's maneuver dial. Then place a [battlestations] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform a [battlestations] Action (even as a free Action) this round.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Romulan Captain.

upgrades.name: Tallera
upgrades.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2 and roll 1 attack die. If you roll a [hit] or [crit] result, discard this card and 1 [crew] Upgrade on the target ship.

upgrades.name: Modified Cloaking Device
upgrades.text: On the round you perform a [cloak] Action, you ship can only be target locked by a ship that is within Range 1 of your ship. In addition, you may roll your full defense dice in spite of the presence of an opposing ship's [scan] Token while you are cloaked.

upgrades.name: Aft Disruptor Emitters
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack.

You may only fire this weapon at a ship that is not in your forward firing arc.
